title: Radio romance
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Victoria - Rural conditions
abstract: Music video proving it's never too late to find true love
description: Radio romance is an endearing work which creates warmth through the subtle use of multiple narratives and the affable assured performance of the band. Camera work and editing confidently exploit the rich setting with the songline expertly supported by the light-hearted use of props. Music performed by Strange Country.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B1007148; Top Screen 2007; Active; 2007
active_carriers_public_types_and_formats: MPEG-2 Digital File; Memory Grid Pod Full Encode
